description.value:
Shroud of the North Wind (Fetish)

Creation Cost: 9 Gnosis

A heavy cloak bound with winter spirits.

Effect (10 minutes):

  • You gain resistance to cold damage
  • Creatures of your choice within 10 feet have disadvantage on opportunity attacks against you
  • You ignore difficult terrain caused by ice, snow, or wind

Usable once per long rest.
description.chat: Fetish (Level 4). Creation cost 9 Gnosis. Activate: for 10 min gain cold resistance; creatures of your choice within 10 ft have disadvantage on opportunity attacks against you; ignore difficult terrain from ice, snow, or wind. Once per long rest.
